bibl.title: Bulletin of Online Emendations to Papyri [BOEP]. Version 5.1 (January 7, 2016).
bibl.note: Emendations appearing in this bulletin have been entered online at www.papyri.info/editor/ via the Papyrological Editor (PE), and have been vetted by members of the PE's editorial board. The list contains corrections [by I. Andorlini, R. Ast, C. Balamoshev, L. Berkes, I. Bonati, W. Clarysse, W.G. Claytor, J. Corke-Webster, H. Cuvigny, A. Delattre, M. Elmaghrabi, J. Gascou, N. Gonis, D. Hagedorn, P. Heilporn, F.A.J. Hoogendijk, S. Kovarik, B. Kramer, N. Litinas, L. Löser, N. Reggiani, J. Rowlandson, M. Sampson, J. Sosin, M. Vierros, K.A. Worp & M. Zellmann-Rohrer] that were adopted between December 4, 2014 and January 7, 2016. These emendations have not appeared previously in print and are presented together for ease of reference and review. - At the end of the bulletin, notice is given of several papyri, which are housed in the University Library in Gothenburg, that have been edited for the first time using the PE. These are full editions, consisting of introduction, text, translation, and commentary: P. Got. 54 descr. [by R. Ast & L. Berkes], 29 descr. [by A. Bernini] and 23 descr. [by L. Berkes].
bibl.seg: Rodney Ast, Lajos Berkes & James M.S. Cowey (edd.), Bulletin of Online Emendations to Papyri [BOEP]. Version 5.1 (January 7, 2016).
Heidelberg, Ruprecht-Karls-Universität Heidelberg, Institut für Papyrologie, 2016, 6 pp.

Emendations appearing in this bulletin have been entered online at www.papyri.info/editor/ via the Papyrological Editor (PE), and have been vetted by members of the PE's editorial board. The list contains corrections [by I. Andorlini, R. Ast, C. Balamoshev, L. Berkes, I. Bonati, W. Clarysse, W.G. Claytor, J. Corke-Webster, H. Cuvigny, A. Delattre, M. Elmaghrabi, J. Gascou, N. Gonis, D. Hagedorn, P. Heilporn, F.A.J. Hoogendijk, S. Kovarik, B. Kramer, N. Litinas, L. Löser, N. Reggiani, J. Rowlandson, M. Sampson, J. Sosin, M. Vierros, K.A. Worp & M. Zellmann-Rohrer] that were adopted between December 4, 2014 and January 7, 2016. These emendations have not appeared previously in print and are presented together for ease of reference and review. - At the end of the bulletin, notice is given of several papyri, which are housed in the University Library in Gothenburg, that have been edited for the first time using the PE. These are full editions, consisting of introduction, text, translation, and commentary: P. Got. 54 descr. [by R. Ast & L. Berkes], 29 descr. [by A. Bernini] and 23 descr. [by L. Berkes].
